datatools¶

Module for storing and manipulating interaction histories @author Siddharth Reddy <sgr45@cornell.edu> 01/07/15

An interaction with an assessment module

class datatools.InteractionHistory(data, sort_by_timestep=False)¶

Class for an interaction history

assessment_interactions()¶

Get assessment interactions

Return type:pd.DataFrame

:return A dataframe of assessment interactions

assessment_pass_rate(assessment_id, timestep=None)¶

Get pass rate for assessment

Parameters:
  • assessment_id (str) – An assessment id
  • timestep (int|None) – Only look at interactions before and at this timestep If None, then look at all interactions
Return type:

float

:return Pass rate

compute_idx_maps(student_idx=None, assessment_idx=None, lesson_idx=None)¶

Fill in self._*idx to map string IDs to indices and self._*_inv_idx to map indices to string IDs

Parameters:
  • int]|None student_idx (dict[str,) – A dictionary mapping student_id to student_idx
  • int]|None assessment_idx (dict[str,) – A dictionary mapping assessment_id to assessment_idx
  • int]|None lesson_idx (dict[str,) – A dictionary mapping lesson_id to lesson_idx

split_interactions_by_type(filtered_history=None)¶

Split history into assessment interactions and lesson interactions

Useful for model parameter estimation

Parameters:filtered_history (pd.DataFrame|None) – A filtered interaction history
Return type:((np.array, np.array, np.array), (np.array, np.array, np.array), dict[str, int])
:return A tuple of assessment interaction components

(np.array(student_idxes), np.array(module_idxes), np.array(outcomes)), lesson interaction components (np.array(student_idxes),

np.array(module_idxes), np.array(times_since_previous_interaction)),

and a dictionary mapping student_id to the timestep of the student’s last interaction

squash_timesteps(num_checkpoints=10)¶

Squash timesteps for consecutive assessment interactions, i.e. timestep should only increment when a student works on a lesson

Parameters:num_checkpoints (int) –

Number of checkpoints to log during iteration over students

class datatools.LessonInteraction(student_id=None, module_id=None, timestep=None, timestamp=None, duration=None)¶

Convert dictionary to Interaction object

Parameters:object] fields (dict[str,) – A dictionary
